snippet: A report’s findings showed that the bulk of the cases involved peacekeepers deployed to some of the most troubled parts of the world.
abstract: United Nations report cites many accusations of rape, sexual assault and sex trafficking against its staff and soldiers around world and proposes remedies to curtail such crimes.
lead_paragraph: A report’s findings showed that the bulk of the cases involved peacekeepers deployed to some of the most troubled parts of the world.

headline.main: United Nations Workers Accused of Sexual Abuse
headline.print_headline: Accusations of Sexual Abuse Against U.N. Workers Are Cited
